attributes.title: Volume 68
attributes.caption: First Fails!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff kick off 2012 with a bang and a crash in Fails of the Weak Volume 68.  This week's worth of failure includes AI fails, human fails and stupid pet tricks.  Enjoy!

attributes.title: Volume 69
attributes.caption: Funny from back to front!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff deliver the 69th batch of Fails for you on this lovely day.  Join them as they celebrate all that is terrible!

attributes.title: Volume 70
attributes.caption: Terribly funny!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff deliver you a pile of goodies in the form of Halo: Reach fails.  Join them in their laughter!

attributes.title: Volume 71
attributes.caption: Flying Grunts!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring forth a wonderful bounty of failure in Halo: Reach.  Hold hands with them as they giggle their way through this new batch.

attributes.title: Volume 72
attributes.caption: Extra Gus!
attributes.description: Your weekly serving of fails with Geoff and special guest Gus!

attributes.title: Volume 73
attributes.caption: Plus Gus!
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus look at another hilarious batch of fails from Halo: Reach.  Join them in their hilarious ways.  Hilarity.  Hilarious.

attributes.title: Volume 74
attributes.caption: Halority!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring forth upon this world a batch of nothing but Halo hilarity and other various goodies.  Laugh with them, won't you

attributes.title: Volume 75
attributes.caption: Whoopsie
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff watch people playing Halo: Reach make oopsies and uhohs!

attributes.title: Volume 76
attributes.caption: Big Ten
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack are back with another group of ten of the funniest fails in Halo: Reach for the week!

attributes.title: Volume 77
attributes.caption: HaLoL
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff present you with ten moments in Halo gaming you can use to feel better about yourself.

attributes.title: Volume 78
attributes.caption: Hey-Whoa
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back with the best in Halo failure for the week.  Watch and enjoy with pleasure.

attributes.title: Volume 79
attributes.caption: Pew Pew
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are at it again, raising their self-worth by making fun of the Halo related missteps of others.

attributes.title: Volume 80
attributes.caption: Kerpow
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff have worked their hardest to compile only the best of the Halo: Reach fails available.  Enjoy them at their finest.  They are delicious.

attributes.title: Volume 81
attributes.caption: Blammo
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff have worked their hardest to compile only the best of the Halo: Reach fails available.  Enjoy them at their finest.  They are delicious, and high in fiber!

attributes.title: Volume 82
attributes.caption: Failuriffic
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff treat you to a delicious pile of failure in the form of Halo: Reach.  Enjoy with a fine wine.

attributes.title: Volume 83
attributes.caption: It's Terribbooo
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring forth only the finest in Halo hilarity and fails.  Enjoy this brand new episode of Fails of the Weak!

attributes.title: Volume 84
attributes.caption: Horrible Accents
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring forth the 84th week of Fails of the Weak!  Watch and enjoy this pile of hilarious screw-ups!

attributes.title: Volume 85
attributes.caption: Killer Birds
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back with even more hilarious fails in the world of Halo: Reach.  Laugh along with them, but don't spit out your drink!

attributes.title: Volume 86
attributes.caption: Spinny Time!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff make it all the way to 86!  Enjoy this week's awesome Fails of the Weak!

attributes.title: Volume 87
attributes.caption: Warping Warthogs!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff look at a compiled list of incredible fails and bloopers from Halo: Reach.  Enjoy their laughter!

attributes.title: Volume 88
attributes.caption: Traveling through Time
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back with the 88th episode of Fails of the Weak.  Where they are going, they don't need roads...or success.

attributes.title: Volume 89
attributes.caption: Pre-3.
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back with another batch of fails for you to enjoy!  Let's all laugh together at the misfortune of others!

attributes.title: Volume 90
attributes.caption: Jack and the Brit
attributes.description: Jack and Gavin bring you a week's worth of awesome failure in Halo: Reach.  Enjoy this batch of awesome.

attributes.title: Volume 91
attributes.caption: Joel returns
attributes.description: Jack and Joel look at a bunch of new fails in Halo: Reach! Join them and laugh along with their nuttiness!

attributes.title: Volume 92
attributes.caption: Karma Chameleon
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff look at another awesome group of hilarious fails in Halo: Reach. Watch out for flying karma!

attributes.title: Volume 93
attributes.caption: Kabooma Chameleon
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue to look at another large pile of failure in this week's Fails of the Weak!

attributes.title: Volume 94
attributes.caption: Friday Failure!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring you the funny in this week's episode of Fails of the Weak! It's a laugh riot!

attributes.title: Volume 95
attributes.caption: Explosey
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff serve up another platter of Halo Failure. Now with more vitamin C!

attributes.title: Volume 96
attributes.caption: Joel is back
attributes.description: Jack and special guest Joel take a look at a week's worth of failure within the planet of Reach. Watch out for flying grunts and rockets!

attributes.title: Volume 97
attributes.caption: Elite Hilarity
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring you an Elite-heavy episode of Fails of the Weak! Enjoy!

attributes.title: Volume 98
attributes.caption: 98 Degrees of Hilarity
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are here with another selection from some of the funniest fails in Halo: Reach this week!

attributes.title: Volume 99
attributes.caption: Where are the balloons?
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are here with Fails of the Weak Volume 99! Enjoy the nines!

attributes.title: Volume 100
attributes.caption: Milestone
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring you the 100th episode of Fails of the Weak! Here's to 100 more episodes!

attributes.title: 100th Episode Special
attributes.caption: Super Special!
attributes.description: We'd like to thank all of our fans for keeping Fails of the Weak going for 100 episodes! Enjoy this special treat for you!

attributes.title: Halo: Reach - Fails of the Weak Volume 101
attributes.caption: Halo Reach
attributes.description: It's Jack! It's Geoff! It's people being shitty at Halo!
attributes.display_title: Halo: Reach - Fails of the Weak Volume 101

attributes.title: Halo Reach - Fails of the Weak Volume 102
attributes.caption: Halo Reach
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take a look at another ten hilarious fails in Halo Reach.
attributes.display_title: Halo Reach - Fails of the Weak Volume 102

attributes.title: Volume 103
attributes.caption: Halo: Reach
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go for the gold this week in Fails of the Weak! Join them as they search for that elusive goal... COMEDY!

attributes.title: Volume 104
attributes.caption: Major Failure
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue the long standing tradition of making fun of a series of clips in Halo: Reach. Laugh along with them!

attributes.title: Volume 105
attributes.caption: Halo Reach
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue the long standing tradition of making fun of a series of clips in Halo: Reach, and Geoff continues his tradition of copying the description from the last episode and pasting it without editing it in any way.

attributes.title: Volume 106
attributes.caption: Phailure
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff bring you the 106th edition of Fails of the Weak! Laugh and enjoy them!

attributes.title: Volume 107
attributes.caption: 107th
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are here with the 107th episode of Fails of the Weak! It's much better than episode 49!

attributes.title: Volume 108
attributes.caption: One-oh-Eight
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are here with the 108th episode of Fails of the Weak! Laugh along with the terribleness.

attributes.title: Volume 109
attributes.caption: Bumfire!
attributes.description: Jack and sometimes Geoff are here to look a fantastic batch of goodies from the world of Halo!

attributes.title: Volume 110
attributes.caption: One-teenth
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are here on this glorious Friday to deliver a batch of failure in Halo: Reach!

attributes.title: Volume 111
attributes.caption: One One One
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are here with an aliteration of a Fails of the Weak. One One One!

attributes.title: Volume 112
attributes.caption: Gavin steps in
attributes.description: Jack and Gavin check out another batch of Halo: Reach failure!

attributes.title: Volume 113
attributes.caption: Massive Failure
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue to bring the funny with today's episode of Fails of the Weak!

attributes.title: Volume 114
attributes.caption: Failtacular
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue to bring the funny with today's episode of Fails of the Weak! Gobble Gobble!

attributes.title: Volume 115
attributes.caption: HaLoL
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take a look at another ten failtacular moments in Halo Reach.

attributes.title: Volume 116
attributes.caption: The end of Reach
attributes.description: In the final episode of Halo: Reach fails (Halo 4 begins next week!) Jack and Geoff reminisce and laugh about previous episodes. Har har.

attributes.title: Volume 117
attributes.caption: A new era
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff begin a new era of Fails, in this first edition of Fails of the Weak in Halo 4!

attributes.title: Volume 118
attributes.caption: The Fourth
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue their exploration of the lighter side of Halo 4 in this week's episode of Fails of the Weak!

attributes.title: Volume 119
attributes.caption: Halols
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff serve up another platter of Halo 4 related failure. Take solace that you're probably not this bad at gaming... unless you're clip is this episode.
